properties.author: Stephen McConnell
David Leangen
properties.title: DPML Community Resources
properties.description: Overview of the community resources provided by the DPML.
properties.keywords: DPML, build, runtime, management, components, soa, java, composition

section.name: Resources
section.p:
The DPML provides various resources for:
providing support to the users of our products
helping DPML community members work together
improving the quality of our products and services
The resources we offer include mailing lists for posting relevant e-mail messages and a code management system for keeping the source code in order and up to date.
